summary: Cuts "call dragon" Shout recovery time from 300 to 10 seconds, so you can easily use "bend will" shout on Odahviing without having to wait 5 minutes
descriptionHtml:
Cuts call dragon Shout recovery time from 300 to 10 seconds, so you can easily use bend will shout on Odahviing without having to wait 5 minutes.

The mod doesn't need any DLCs, however without Dragonborn and bend will shout it serves little purpose.


Installation:

unpack file, move it to your skyrim data folder and allow it through skyrim launcher or mod manager
author: proud2Bnerd
